oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: USN-819-1 -- linux, linux-source-2.6.15 vulnerability
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Tavis Ormandy and Julien Tinnes discovered that Linux did not correctly initialize certain socket operation function pointers. A local attacker could exploit this to gain root privileges. By default, Ubuntu 8.04 and later with a non-zero /proc/sys/vm/mmap_min_addr setting were not vulnerable.

oval-def:modified.comment: EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:13819 - added CVE references; also made minor updates
